ctu.nengoros.comm.nodeFactory.javanode.impl

Class JNodeContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ctu.nengoros.comm.nodeFactory.javanode.impl.JNodeContainer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExternalNodeContainer, JavaNodeContainer

    public class JNodeContainer
extends java.lang.Object
implements JavaNodeContainer
    Implementation of JavaNode, this class serves as a container for NodeMain (an actual Java ROS node)

        Get name which somehow identifies this node. In the best case return the name of ROS node that the node will use. If this information is not available, return the name of class, process etc.. This name will be used by namespaceSupervisor
